participant_2.background:
I now spend more time listening to rap music and working on my Ford truck.
I enjoy watching game shows and designing clothes in my spare time.
I am not sure of my ethnic background, but I love pepperoni pizza!
i work at a restaurant as waiter.
i ve been married for five years.

content.text: Hey there! Hope you're having a good day so far.
Hi! I am, thank you! How are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to listen to rap music, work on my truck, and watch game shows.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I like to watch game shows too. Do you have a favorite one?
I like Family Feud, but I also like The Price is Right.
Those are both good ones! I like Family Feud too. What do you like about them?
I like the competition and the fact that you can win money.
I agree, they are both really fun to watch. Do you play any other games?
I like to play basketball, but I'm not very good at it.
That's okay, I'm not very good at it either. I just like to play for fun.
Me too! It's a great way to get exercise and have some fun at the same time.
I agree! What else do you like to do for fun?
I like to design clothes in my spare time.
That's really cool! Do you sell your designs?
I've thought about it, but I haven't done it yet.
You should! I'm sure people would love your designs.
Thanks! I might just do that.
I'm sure you'd be great at it
